strategy: The Genestealer Cult has a strategy rating of 2.
Initiative: All formations have an initiative rating ot 2+

sections.name: Acolyte Formations
sections.description: One Broodcoven formation must be taken.

formations.name: 1 Broodcoven
formations.units: One Genesteler Patriarch and six Acolyte Honourguard units

formations.name: Acolyte Coven
formations.units: One Acolyte Iconward and seven Acolytes

sections.name: Neophyte Formations
sections.description: One Neophyte Formation may be fielded per Acolyte Formation

formations.name: Infantry Platoon
formations.units: One Neophyte Commander and seven Neophytes

formations.name: Mechanized Infantry Platoon
formations.units: One Neophyte Commander, five Neophytes and three Chimeras

sections.name: Neophyte Support Formations
sections.description: One Neophyte Support Formation may be fielded per Neophyte Formation

sections.name: Purestrain Formations
sections.description: Up to one quarter of the points available may be spent on Purestrain Formations

formations.name: Genestealer Swarm
extraUnits: Add up to three Genestealers: 25 points each

upgrades.title: Upgrades
upgrades.description: Each upgrade may be taken once per formation.

items.name: Acolyte Transports
items.description: Add Land Transporters, Goliath Trucks or Goliath Rockgrinders to the formation, up to the number required to transport all infantry units in the formation

items.name: Coven Leader
items.description: Add one Genestealer Magus or Genestealer Primus character to an Acholyte Iconward unit in the formation

items.name: Fire Support
items.description: Add two Neophyte Fire Support units

items.name: Hybrids
items.description: Add up to five of the following units to the formation

items.name: Riderunners
items.description: Add up to three Ridgerunner units
